channel.title: Question
channel.description: If someone gets banned permanently are we allowed to destroy the things they built?

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @triston001 triston001
item.description:
@triston001 wrote:

pika pika…

Read full topic

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

But I was living with Matty also!

Read full topic

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I guess it should probably just become the same as unclaimed land.

IE, first come, first serve. But I think in this case, since Tom and Matty were basically living together, it probably just goes to Tom.

Read full topic

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

I don’t want to logon due to fear of lagg death, so go ahead and do it yourself if you want

Read full topic

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

[quote=“Tom_BETA, post:25, topic:425433”]How did a fence with multiple exits make it hard to enter? No one was given consent to grief the property and so it is griefing and I will enforce the rules as they are written in the official server thread.

My above post still stands. Griefing someones property with no consent to a level which has been shown here as pure spite isn’t acceptable in any situation. I find this situation quite aggravating because there is no reason what so ever to go inside someones property and grief it top to bottom then leave (referring to others as well)

As I said, there is a clear line between sharing and griefing and this is griefing.

The chests aren’t unlocked either.[/quote]

if we’re sharing this, would you be so kind as to remove your cobble blockade blocking our bridge?

Read full topic

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @deathwilldie0 deathwilldie0
item.description:
@deathwilldie0 wrote:

[quote=“Tom_BETA, post:23, topic:425433”]Deathwilldie, either repair everything you’ve broke or I’ll roll you back and punish you. There is a distinct difference between sharing and griefing, you have punchured random holes everywhere and destroyed different segments of his glass towers (Which is quite hypocritical coming from you lot considering it now looks ugly and looked rather nice before).

The redstone has been griefed, several parts of the structure have been set on fire and someones put blocks everywhere. You also set his fences on fire, and removed the border.

I don’t like banning people who I feel have been good members of the community for a while, but you’ve done this without a staff members consent so I am giving you one chance to sort it out. The same goes for others - I’ll be checking back in a few days.

Sound fair?[/quote]

I’ll repair the glass and put the fences back, and that’s it because that’s all I did. I havn’t done anything else with redstone or anything. That wasn’t my doing that was someone else.

Read full topic

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

How did a fence with multiple exits make it hard to enter? No one was given consent to grief the property and so it is griefing and I will enforce the rules as they are written in the official server thread.

My above post still stands. Griefing someones property with no consent to a level which has been shown here as pure spite isn’t acceptable in any situation. I find this situation quite aggravating because there is no reason what so ever to go inside someones property and grief it top to bottom then leave (referring to others as well)

As I said, there is a clear line between sharing and griefing and this is griefing.

The chests aren’t unlocked either.

Read full topic

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @triston001 triston001
item.description:
@triston001 wrote:

tecknically david2 did say it was as much as ours as it is urs, so with said wouldnt that mean that death could do some of what he did? btw way u did also say it was ‘easily’ accessible and that border made it difficult so he souldnt have to replace that border. and those traps should be deacivated since it is now territory for anyone. but lets get mitb’s judgment before u do anything tom. plus the chest’s are unlocked so it should be free game as well…

Read full topic

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Deathwilldie, either repair everything you’ve broke or I’ll roll you back and punish you. There is a distinct difference between sharing and griefing, you have punchured random holes everywhere and destroyed different segments of his glass towers (Which is quite hypocritical coming from you lot considering it now looks ugly and looked rather nice before).

The redstone has been griefed, several parts of the structure have been set on fire and someones put blocks everywhere. You also set his fences on fire, and removed the border.

I don’t like banning people who I feel have been good members of the community for a while, but you’ve done this without a staff members consent so I am giving you one chance to sort it out. The same goes for others - I’ll be checking back in a few days.

Sound fair?

Read full topic

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @omgilikepie omgilikepie
item.description:
@omgilikepie wrote:

I agree…it’s nonsense.

Read full topic

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @Tarkoff Tarkoff
item.description:
@Tarkoff wrote:

That really should be in the server.
When you get banned your locks open up. It just makes sense, so we don’t have all these stupid chests around forever.
I’ve had girlman’s chests stuck in a tunnel for a long time now.

Read full topic

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

Considering tom was his closest ally, shouldn’t it be like a will and everything in Magma’s chests go to Tom?

Read full topic

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

If someone is permanently banned, I see no reason why their stuff shouldn’t be up for grabs. The only thing I can’t decide on is how someone could say that they get to have it instead of someone else. I guess I could say it’s just as much Toms as it is yours, if you know what I mean. I think we should wait and see what MITB has to say.

Tom may consider it hostile whether it’s against the rules or not, so it’s up to you guys if you want to risk it.

Read full topic

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @Tarkoff Tarkoff
item.description:
@Tarkoff wrote:

The question is still valid.
Remove Matty form the topic.
Is it against the rules to grief a banned players property?

I would like to think yes and no.
The property should become open and “claimable”. and who ever claims it can do what ever they want to it.
In this case we can say Mattys stuff has been claimed and wont be touched.
But it would be good to lay down the rules so there is no further problems in the future. like how to claim a banned property.

Read full topic

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @omgilikepie omgilikepie
item.description:
@omgilikepie wrote:

Wow…I don’t even know what to say about all of this

Read full topic

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

[quote=“Phaze One, post:15, topic:425433”][quote author=Tom_BETA link=topic=528097.msg3851321#msg3851321 date=1324044898]

Except your buildings are part of a community of people and belong there. Magma’s lair was an unaccessible hole which only he could enter

Clearly you’ve never seen it, it has ladders and is clearly visible and accessible.
[/quote]

Clearly you haven’t been there lately. He has rigged traps to kill anyone who tries to enter that only him and agl know how to disable.[/quote]

And there is a problem with doing that? Just because he isn’t the spreader of peace doesn’t mean you get to grief their property.

PS he’s had traps there for ages, just use your common sense.

Read full topic

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

[quote=“Tom_BETA, post:14, topic:425433”][quote author=Phaze One link=topic=528097.msg3851310#msg3851310 date=1324044280]
Except your buildings are part of a community of people and belong there. Magma’s lair was an unaccessible hole which only he could enter
[/quote]

Clearly you’ve never seen it, it has ladders and is clearly visible and accessible.[/quote]

Clearly you haven’t been there lately. He has rigged traps to kill anyone who tries to enter that only him and agl know how to disable.

Read full topic

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Phaze One:

Except your buildings are part of a community of people and belong there. Magma’s lair was an unaccessible hole which only he could enter

Clearly you’ve never seen it, it has ladders and is clearly visible and accessible.

[quote=“badger41, post:13, topic:425433”]Not to mention[quote author=Tom_BETA link=topic=528097.msg3851204#msg3851204 date=1324026048]
I see the removal of my allies property as an act of hostility, and hostility is dealt with hostility.
[/quote]

now youre just being petty.

hes perm banned and wont be able to use his stuff anymore, we dont want to destroy everything, just the ugly stuff above ground

and im 99% sure you wont even be online except maybe once a month now because he is banned.[/quote]

Stop being an idiot with all these assumptions, I’ll be online when the server is upgraded to MC 1.0. It’s also only ugly to you and your friends, it isn’t considered ugly to me and you have no right to remove it.

If you touch my bunker I consider it griefing. You’re the one being petty go and play with your own property and not others.

I really hate having to come on threads and defend things like this, just let it be, matty may be banned but it doesn’t mean you get to destroy/do what you want to his property. I also didn’t speak to matty ingame for months and still remained active.

There is no “special link” between me and matty, it’s a flaw in human logic and all in your head.

Read full topic

hes perm banned and wont be able to use his stuff anymore, we dont want to destroy everything, just the ugly stuff above ground

and im 99% sure you wont even be online except maybe once a month now because he is banned.

item.dc:creator: @omgilikepie omgilikepie
